CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1941, pg. 10 reads: "Gay Hilltoppers Prepare For Outdoor Dance August 15 - The Gay Hilltoppers, swanky Beltzhoover club, are making plans for a spiffy sport dance in he cool shade of Linden Grove, Friday evening, August 15. Bernice Leftridge is chairman of this pleasing midsummer event.  Pictured are the popular members: Ruth O'Donnell, Margaret Moore, Georgia Perry, Bernice Leftridge, Martha White, Azalia Horton, Mary Monroe, Marian Bryant, Margaret Cobbs, Dorothy Reed, Gertrude Holmes, Esther Summers, Ruth Comer, Isabel Jones, president; Elizabeth Wallace, Helen Thompson, Ardea Briggs, Alene Young, Armenter Carter.  Members not in picture: Natalie Anthony, Edna Parker, Lyda Robinson, Inez Wilson, Ethel Ball and Sarah Haynes.  The photo was taken at the residence of Mrs. Cobbs, at a recent meeting. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Gay Hilltoppers, including Ruth O'Donnell, Margaret Moore, Georgia Perry, Bernice Leftridge, Martha White, Azalia Horton, Mary Monroe, Marian Bryant, Margaret Cobbs, Dorothy Reed, Gertrude Holmes, Esther Summers, Ruth Comer, president Isabel Jones, Elizabeth Wallace, Helen Thompson, Ardea Briggs, Alene Young, and Armenter Carter, standing on stairs outside of Cobbs home
